_header: An angel fro heaven gan light
_description: A song of the Knot of the Trinity — five quatrains and two-line burden: ‘Off al the knottes that I se / I prese the knot in Trinite’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
An aungell fro heun gan lythA greth a maydyn þat was so
                    bryth…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…to al men he xal sayLo man what knot I knyt for
                    the
